name: codespaces_list-repo-secrets
description: Lists all secrets available in a repository without revealing their encrypted values. You must authenticate using an access token with the `repo` scope to use this endpoint. GitHub Apps must have write access to the `codespaces_secrets` repository permission to use this endpoint.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

per_page.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

page.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
